scripts.build-deploy: APP=xt-type && rm -rf ./dist/out-tsc/lib && tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json && rm -rf ./dist/$STAGE/$APP && tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json -outDir ./dist/$STAGE/$APP && cp ./package.json ./dist/$STAGE/$APP
scripts.build-deploy-up: APP=xt-type && rm -rf ./dist/out-tsc/lib && env NODE_ENV=production tsup && rm -rf ./dist/$STAGE/$APP && tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json -outDir ./dist/$STAGE/$APP && cp ./package.json ./dist/$STAGE/$APP
